meanings.definition: A member of a nomadic Arab tribe in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: The beduin traveled across the desert with their camels.
meanings.sent2: I read a book about the beduin and their traditional lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The beduin decided to have a picnic in the middle of the desert.
meanings.sent4: Her free spirit was like that of a beduin wandering the vast sands.
meanings.sent5: The image of the beduin riding into the sunset stayed with me.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Bedouin people or their way of life.
meanings.sent1: The tent was decorated with beautiful beduin patterns.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beduin-inspired scarf to the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: The beduin-style tea set added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: His adventurous spirit was as wild as the beduin lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The desert landscape was reminiscent of beduin traditions.
